content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Wang. I'm sure you will find it to be a comfortable and convenient living space. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 350 Euro per month is a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The location and quality of this apartment are exceptional, and I believe it deserves a higher rent. How about 400 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but considering the average rent in the city center, 370 Euro per month is more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but 370 Euro per month is still below my expectation. Let's meet in the middle. How about 385 Euro per month? This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 380 Euro per month sounds more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot go lower than 385 Euro per month. This is a new, unfurnished apartment in the city center, and I believe the location alone justifies the price. If you're interested, we can proceed with the paperwork at this rate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [380] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 380 Euro per month. The price must be 385 Euro per month to reflect the value of the apartment. If you're not willing to pay this amount, I'm afraid we cannot proceed with the rental.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is already at a reasonable level and I cannot accept any higher.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but as the landlord, I must ensure that the rent reflects the value of the property. Since we cannot agree on a price, I will have to consider other potential tenants. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
